description: Situated off the tourist trail in a charming residential district, this restaurant is popular with locals from Livorno who come here to enjoy the fresh fish on offer – the vast selection on the buffet makes dining here a real treat. In summer, choose a table on the delightful outdoor veranda.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
